item.description: Nancy Chen reports on flood rescue and recovery efforts in Texas, and how a new Barbie doll is helping thousands of children feel more seen.

item.title: Trump heads to Texas flood zone, avoiding criticism he's heaped on other governors
item.description: President Donald Trump will travel to Texas on Friday in the wake of devastating floods that killed at least 120 people, including dozens of children.

item.title: Possible breakthrough in search for dozens allegedly killed by rogue cops
item.description: Fifteen police officers are under investigation over a spate of mysterious disappearances in 2022 in the country's huge cockfighting industry.

item.title: Head Start will be cut off for immigrants without legal status, Trump administration says
item.description: The Trump administration says it will restrict immigrants in the country illegally from enrolling in Head Start, a federally funded preschool program.
